about_the_game:
Embark on an "epic" adventure in a 2.5D topdown perspective game where you can shape the world to your liking. Explore the vast cave systems and conquer dangerous biomes as you gather materials and craft powerful tools to aid you in your quest. With a dynamic tier system, you'll be able to break harder blocks and conquer more challenging enemies. But be warned, the cave is filled with deadly creatures and giant bosses that stand in your way.

The fate of a magical tree rests in your hands as it is under siege by the enemy biomes. Your ultimate goal is to heal the tree and secure its safety. Along the way, you'll have the opportunity to fish, build, ride in a minecart, wire up some lights and farm crops to aid in your journey. Can you rise to the challenge and become the "epic" hero the cave needs? Find out in this survival game. About a cave.

name: Undergrown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2957U 1.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 112MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game runs in Godot 3.4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 11600k 3.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Game runs in Godot 3.4

short_description: Explore a 2.5D topdown cave world and craft powerful tools to conquer dangerous biomes, fight giant bosses and save a magical tree from enemy conquership. Experience the thrill of building, fishing, traveling via minecart and farming in this cool survival game.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Lithuanian
